structure.unit: B LICENSING AND PUBLIC EMPLOYMENT QUALIFICATIONS

text.section: Any party aggrieved by a final order issued by a hiring or licensing authority after a hearing may appeal to Franklin Circuit Court in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 312, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 210, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978.
